attributes.action: Outlaw sexist "women only" car insurance companies.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: More and more companies are providing insurance for ladies only. If an isurance company decided to provide for men only or only Christians or Muslims there would be an outcry. I want to see fairer insurance schemes for sensible drivers regardless of age creed or sex.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
